title: Lionel Messi free-kick hands Inter Miami Club World Cup victory over Porto (Video)

Over at the FIFA Club World Cup, Porto took an early lead against Inter Miami through Samu Aghehowa. However, Telasco Segovia equalized after the restart.

And it was eight-time Ballon d‚ÄôOr winner Lionel Messi who had the final word, bringing victory to the MLS side with this top-drawer free-kick.
